Just to let everyone know, if you have a Shinsengumi related fic  that 
you read and loved to death or wrote yourself and are  especially fond 
of let me know or send it to me..

If anyone knows April-san would you remind her that she promised to get 
me a copy of Team Spirits after she made some changes she was 
considering? I LOVE that fic and I want to share it with the world!

And hey it would be sooo cool if you visually artistic folk would care 
to sketch something to illustrate any of the fics we already have up or 
for ones that you care to submit or recommend.

-- 
Barbara Sheridan
http://www.barbarasheridan.net
